caption.title: Distribution of viral infection rates in relation to the age of patients.
caption.p: Four age groups are defined: G1 (1–3 m, blue), G2 (4–6 m, orange), G3 (7–12 m, red), and G4 (13–60 m, green). The rates of viral infection are represented in the y-axis, and the x-axis is described by tested viruses.
